trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for selecting a file name.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于选择文件名的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor> provides a file selection dialog box for file name selection and editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor> 提供用于选择文件名称和编辑的文件选择对话框。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses an <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> to associate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor> with a property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor>具有属性。

trans-unit.source: You may inherit from this class to provide your own title for the dialog and your own file list filter extensions.
trans-unit.target: 你可能继承此类，以提供您自己的标题对话框以及你自己的文件列表筛选器扩展。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: A service provider object through which editing services may be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 可通过其获取编辑服务的服务提供程序对象。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the value being edited.
trans-unit.target: 正在编辑的值的实例。

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified object using the editor style provided by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor.GetEditStyle(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor.GetEditStyle(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)" /> 方法提供的编辑器样式编辑指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的新值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the object hasn't changed, this should return the same object it was passed.
trans-unit.target: 如果该对象的值尚未更改，则这应返回与传递给它的对象相同的对象。

trans-unit.source: A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 提供服务提供程序以获取任何所需要的编辑服务。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing style used by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor.EditValue(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor.EditValue(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> 方法所使用的编辑样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle" /> values indicating the provided editing style.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle" /> 值之一，指示所提供的编辑样式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor.EditValue%2A> method is not supported, this method will return <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor.EditValue%2A>不支持方法，此方法将返回<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog" /> to use to select a file name.
trans-unit.target: 用来选择文件名的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the open file dialog when it is created.
trans-unit.target: 在创建打开文件对话框时初始化此对话框。

trans-unit.source: This method configures the dialog box with a generic file filter and title.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用泛型文件筛选器和标题配置对话框。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to customize the initialization of the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法以自定义对话框的初始化。
